valid: For the period 12:00 (UTC) on Tue 2 Dec 2025 to 12:00 (UTC) on Wed 3 Dec 2025
general_synopsis: Low just west of Rockall 973 expected Hebrides 988 by 0600 tomorrow. Low Fair Isle 979 expected Norwegian Sea 983 by same time

Southwesterly 7 to severe gale 9, decreasing 5 or 6, backing southerly 5 to 7 later.

Good, occasionally poor.
